segments.text: There are so many record players here . That is hard to choose .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at this one . It has a radio and cassette player and built in speakers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd rather get one with separated speakers.They give a clear sound .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but we shouldn't get any thing too big . Remember it has to fit in with our living room furniture .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . Now this one looks alright ? It's a detached or do you prefer this one ? It's Sony .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's ask the salesmen for a demonstration .
segments.speaker: S2
